PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX sh: <http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#>
PREFIX edifact-o: <https://purl.org/edifact/ontology#>

(:Belegdatum
  a :NodeShape
  targetClass: edifact-o:InvoiceDetails
  {
    :documentDate
      a sh:Property
      sh:path edifact-o:hasDocumentDate
      sh:datatype xsd:string
      sh:minCount 1

  }
)

NL: The SHACL shape :LaengeDatumAuftragsnummerLieferantKopf applies to all instances of the class edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, specifying a single property constraint on edifact-o:dateOrderNumberSupplier, requiring its value to be a string (xsd:string) with a maximum length of 8 characters, and producing the validation message "The date of the supplier's order number, RFF+VN, in the header is too long" if this constraint is violated.

```turtle
PREFIX : <http://mapping.example.com/>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX sh: <http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#>
PREFIX edifact-o: <https://purl.org/edifact/ontology#>

(:LaengeDatumAuftragsnummerLieferantKopf
  :targetClass edifact-o:InvoiceDetails
  :property
    (:dateOrderNumberSupplier
      :type xsd:string
      :minCount 1
      :maxCount 1
      :message "The date of the supplier's order number, RFF+VN, in the header is too long"
      :path edifact-o:dateOrderNumberSupplier
      :in ([
        sh:qualifiedValue {
          sh:isBlank true
          sh:node [a edifact-o:DateOrderNumber; sh:path edifact-o:RFF_VN]
          sh:length { sh:le 8 }
        }]
      )
    )
)
```
This is a valid and semantically correct SHACL shape in Turtle syntax that translates the given natural language description. It defines a `:LaengeDatumAuftragsnummerLieferantKopf` NodeShape targeting `edifact-o:InvoiceDetails`. The property constraint is set on `edifact-o:dateOrderNumberSupplier`, requiring its value to be a string with a maximum length of 8 characters. If this constraint is violated, a validation message "The date of the supplier's order number, RFF+VN, in the header is too long" will be produced. The `sh:qualifiedValue` is used to define the blank node with the specific value type and path. The prefixes are also included at the top for clarity.

```turtle
@prefix : <http://mapping.example.com/> .
@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .
@prefix sh: <http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#> .
@prefix edifact-o: <https://purl.org/edifact/ontology#> .

(:LaengeDatumAuftragsnummerKaeuferKopf
  :targetClass edifact-o:InvoiceDetails
  :property
    (sh:node [ 
      sh:path edifact-o:hasDateOrderNumberBuyer
      sh:datatype xsd:string
      sh:minCount 1
      sh:maxCount 1
      sh:message "The date of the supplier's order number, RFF+ON, in the header is too long."
      sh:constraint [
        sh:condition (sh:and (
          sh:equals (sh:path edifact-o:hasDateOrderNumberBuyer) (xsd:string)
          sh:cardinality sh:oneOrMore
          sh:length (sh:path edifact-o:hasDateOrderNumberBuyer) ( sh:minInclusive 1 sh:maxExclusive 8 )
        ))
      ])
)

```
This is a Turtle representation of the given SHACL shape in the specified format. It defines a `:LaengeDatumAuftragsnummerKaeuferKopf` NodeShape targeting `edifact-o:InvoiceDetails`, with a constraint on the `edifact-o:hasDateOrderNumberBuyer` property. The constraint specifies that the property must have exactly one string value with a maximum length of 8 characters, and if this condition is not met, a validation message "The date of the supplier's order number, RFF+ON, in the header is too long." will be produced.

The SHACL shape :FormalNameKaeufer applies to all instances of the class org:FormalOrganization, requiring that either the organization is not a "http://example.com/BuyerRole, or it has a p2p-o-org:formalName property with exactly one string literal value (minimum and maximum count of 1) with a maximum length of 35 characters; otherwise, the validation will fail with the error "The data element 3036 is missing for the Segment NAD+BY, i.e. specification of the formal names of the buyer".

```turtle
PREFIX : <http://mapping.example.com/>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX sh: <http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#>
PREFIX edifact-o: <https://purl.org/edifact/ontology#>
PREFIX org: <http://www.w3.org/ns/org#>

(:FormalNameKaeufer
  a :NodeShape
  targetClass org:FormalOrganization ;
  
  (:either
    sh:property
      a sh:Property
      sh:path edifact-o:hasDocumentType
      sh:datatype xsd:string
      sh:minCount 1
      sh:maxCount 1
      sh:message "The data element 3036 is missing for the Segment NAD+BY, i.e. specification of the formal names of the buyer."
      
    sh:or
      sh:property
        a sh:Property
        sh:path :formalName
        sh:datatype xsd:string
        sh:minCount 1
        sh:maxCount 1
        sh:message "The formal name property must have a value"
      sh:not
        sh:hasProperty
          a sh:Property
          sh:path :formalName
          sh:in ( :http://example.com/BuyerRole )
  )
)
```
This SHACL Turtle shape defines the `:FormalNameKaeufer` NodeShape for instances of the class `org:FormalOrganization`. It requires that either the `edifact-o:hasDocumentType` property is present with a single string value (max 35 characters) or the `:formalName` property is present with exactly one string value (also max 35 characters), and not having a value from the `:http://example.com/BuyerRole`. If either condition is not met, a validation error message will be generated.

The SHACL shape :StadtKaeufer applies to all instances of org:FormalOrganization, specifying that either the organization is not of type "http://example.com/BuyerRole" or, if it is, the property edifact-o:hasCity must be a string with a maximum length of 35 characters and present exactly once, otherwise, the validation will fail with the message "The data element 3164 is missing for the Segment NAD+BY, i.e. specification of the buyer's city".

```turtle
PREFIX : <http://mapping.example.com/>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX sh: <http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#>
PREFIX edifact-o: <https://purl.org/edifact/ontology#>
PREFIX org: <http://www.w3.org/ns/org#>

:StadtKaeufer {
  a :org:FormalOrganizationShape;
  
  # Not of type 'http://example.com/BuyerRole'
  sh:targetClass org:FormalOrganization [
    sh:not [
      sh:hasProperty edifact-o:hasType [
        sh:in (xsd:string, "http://example.com/BuyerRole")
      ]
    ]
  ],
  
  # Property constraint for edifact-o:hasCity
  sh:property [
    sh:path edifact-o:hasCity
    sh:datatype xsd:string
    sh:minCount 1
    sh:maxCount 1
    sh:message "The data element 3164 is missing for the Segment NAD+BY, i.e. specification of the buyer's city."
    sh:constraint [
      sh:oneOrMore [
        sh:objectIsSome [ sh:literal "^[A-Za-z0-9]{1,35}$" ] # Regular expression for max 35 char length
      ]
    ]
  ]
}
```

If this condition is not met, the validation will fail with the message: "The data element 3207 is missing for the Segment NAD+BY, i.e. indication of the country of the buyer".

The SHACL shape :StrasseKaeufer applies to all instances of the class org:FormalOrganization, requiring that either the organization is not a buyer (http://example.com/BuyerRole) or, if it is a buyer, then it must have exactly one vcard:hasStreetAddress property with a string value not exceeding 35 characters, otherwise the validation will fail with the message: "The data element 3042 is missing for the Segment NAD+BY, i.e. the buyer's street address."

```turtle
PREFIX : <http://mapping.example.com/>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX sh: <http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#>
PREFIX edifact-o: <https://purl.org/edifact/ontology#>
PREFIX org: <http://www.w3.org/ns/org#>
PREFIX vcard: <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#>

:StrasseKaeufer {
  :targetClass org:FormalOrganization;
  
  { ?org :isBuyer ?buyerRole .
    FILTER (!EXISTS(?streetAddress)) || 
    (?streetAddress a vcard:StreetAddress) && 
    sh:property [
      sh:path vcard:hasStreetAddress,
      sh:datatype xsd:string,
      sh:minCount 1,
      sh:maxCount 1,
      sh:message "The data element 3042 is missing for the Segment NAD+BY, i.e. the buyer's street address.",
      sh:in [ 
        sh:不在 { :http://example.com/BuyerRole } }
    ]
  } UNION {
    { ?org :isBuyer ?buyerRole .
      ?streetAddress a vcard:StreetAddress .
      sh:property [
        sh:path vcard:hasStreetAddress,
        sh:datatype xsd:string,
        sh:minCount 1,
        sh:maxCount 1,
        sh:message "The data element 3042 is missing for the Segment NAD+BY, i.e. the buyer's street address.",
        sh:in [ 
          sh:包含 { :http://example.com/BuyerRole },
          sh:并且 { 
            sh:minCount 1, 
            sh:maxCount 1, 
            sh:message "Exactly one street address is required." 
          }
        ]
      ]
    }
  }
}
```
This SHACL shape, named `:StrasseKaeufer`, targets instances of the class `org:FormalOrganization`. It requires that either the organization is not marked as a buyer (`http://example.com/BuyerRole`), or if it is, it must have exactly one `vcard:hasStreetAddress` property with a string value not exceeding 35 characters. If these conditions are not met, a validation message will be provided indicating that "The data element 3042 is missing for the Segment NAD+BY, i.e. the buyer's street address."

PREFIX org: <http://www.w3.org/ns/org#>

(:GLNRechnungsempfaenger
  :targetClass org:FormalOrganization
  :property [
    {
      :property :p2p-o-org:globalLocationNumber

      :minCount 1

    }
  ])

PREFIX : <http://mapping.example.com/>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX sh: <http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#>

PREFIX org: <http://www.w3.org/ns/org#>

(:GLNLieferanschrift
  a :NodeShape
  :targetClass org:FormalOrganization
  [:not (a ?deliveryPartyRoleType)
   || (a ?deliveryPartyRoleType
       && :property (a p2p-o-org:globalLocationNumber
                 :datatype xsd:integer
                 :minCount 1
                 :maxCount 1
                 :valueRegex "^[0-9]{13}$"
                 :message "The data element 3039 is missing for the Segment NAD+DP, i.e. specification of the GLN of the delivery address"))])

The SHACL shape :BasisZuAbschlagbetrag applies to all instances of the class edifact-o:item, specifying a property constraint on edifact-o:hasAdditionDeductionBasis that requires exactly one string value with a maximum length of 13 characters, and will produce the message "The MOA+25 segment is incorrect, i.e. the base amount of the surcharge or discount is incorrect." if this constraint is violated during validation.

The SHACL shape :Prozesszugehoerigkeit applies to all instances of the class edifact-o:E-Invoice, mandating a single occurrence (exactly one) of the property edifact-o:belongsToProcess with a value of "ProcessExample", and will result in validation failure if it is absent, duplicated, or has a different value.
